full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SLOB DPON PADMA MDZAD PA'I GTOR TSOGS KYIS GNANG NAS 'BYUNG BA'I THAN 'BUM ZOR MDOS GNAM LCAGS THOG MNGA' ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO ZUR BRGYAN GYI BKOD PA'O, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015B (DPAL YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE'I GDONG PA CAN GYI SGO NAS THAN 'BUM ZOR MDOS GNAM LCAGS THOG MDA' ZHES BYA BA, 'DI NI AA MDO AER HE DAR HANG NANG SO PHUN TSOGS BKRA SHIS YANG YANG MANG PO BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SNYIGS MA'I DUS 'DIR SEMS CAN LA NAD DANG GNOD PA BKRA MI SHIS PA SNA TSOGS MI KHA BRAM MCHU BSAM NGAN SPYOR RTZUB @016A *, ,DBANG THANG RLUNG RTA RGUD PA DANG, ,GDON BGEGS DUS MIN 'CHI BA BAR CHAD MI MTHUN PA'I PHYOGS THAMS CAD ZHI ZHING BZLOG PA'I PHYIR DU BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS SBYAR YI GE PA NI NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'PHEL LO, ,SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR RNAL 'BYOR BDAG CAG DPON SLOB YON MCHOD 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA LA GNOD 'TSE BAR BYED PA'I DGRA BGEGS LOG 'DREN THAMS CAD LTA NYID DU TSAR GCOD PAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,BSTAN 'GRO MANG PO LA 'PHAN PAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
